name: Prototype 3 (Scorpion 37)
description:
Prototype 3 is a 2D platformer game in which you have no limits. Hop and fly around in the speed of light to make it to the end of the stage without falling into lava or down into the abyss. It is mainly made for learning purposes. The controls are simple:

  • A to move right
  • D to move left
  • W or SPACE to jump
  • ESCAPE to quit the game

Arrow key and gamepad controls are supported too-ish.

Have fun!
